originalText.text:
I had the great pleasure of working with Paul. Paul was able to find me a new opportunity in relatively short period of time. He was nothing short of excellent. He communicated well, personable and always put my interest first. Also, was never pushy and aggressive.
If you have the opportunity to work with this company, ask for Paul. You won’t regret it

originalText.text:
Steve Rosenblatt who is now President of Genuine Search Group placed me at my previous employer 14 years ago. I loved the job so much and worked there 13.5 years until the job was relocated recently. Steve helped me once again to find another great position with only a couple of months searching. He stayed on top of every opportunity that was a good match for me and never left me in the dark. He helped me preparing for interviews, followed up after each interview and kept me updated with the results. He is very professional and gave great advice.
I highly recommend Steve and Genuine Search Group. It is the best agency for job searching and for employers to find the right people.

originalText.text: I've had the pleasure of working with Paul Goldman from Genuine Search Group.  Unlike other recruiters who were disengaged and slow in their updates, Paul was enthusiastic, responsive, and quickly helped me find the right role for my career advancement.  I would highly recommend Genuine Search for anyone looking to advance their professional goals.

Unlike other recruiters who were disengaged and slow in their updates, Paul was enthusiastic, responsive, and quickly helped me find the right role for my career advancement.  I would highly recommend Genuine Search for anyone looking to advance their professional goals.

originalText.text: It was a pleasure working with Paul and Steve they are detailed oriented follow up promptly and are extremely flexible. They we're able to help me find my ideal job while accommodating my hectic schedule. I would highly recommend working with Genuine Seach Group they're the best recruiters I've work with

originalText.text: I have been working with this company for over a month now.  I can't put in words how much they have been there supporting my career. I couldn't do my job efficiently without their constant support at every turn. I don't know of any organization that truly and willingness to put their candidates first and going above and beyond their expectations. They anticipate my needs before I can say a word. I don't really know how the introduction of myself and Genuine met but boy, am the lucky one to have be so fortunate to have them represent me to potential clients of theirs. They're loyal, fair and completely transparent. Having Genuine in my circle gives me great confidence and a raises my self-worth to a level of the highest standards of excellence. When you hear it takes a village, well their my village and my tenure with them will lead me to financial independence from working with their unique clientele. What a wonderful surprise I fell into and will happily continue to grow with them as long as possible. Absolutely priceless.
